name: Worms TechWar
description:
Worms: TechWars is an Epitech Project known as IndieStudio. We realized this project with a team of 5 members.

The game was based on Worms Armageddon. That's why we have some sounds and visual assets in common.

The game feature a lot of different weapons with all classic worm's weapons like Rocket Launcher, Holy Grenade, Jetpack, Airstrike and more.

All maps are randomly generated and you can chose to regenerate the map if you don't like it.

The game is playable from 1 to 4 players, you can play alone against the computer or with friends !
